scripts.test: (cd api && npm test && npm start &) && (cd ionic-app && npm test)
scripts.goodmorning: (cd api && rm -R node_modules && npm install) && (cd ionic-app && rm -R node_modules && npm install)
scripts.api:worker: npm run api:build && docker-compose run --rm --service-ports --name gnome-worker api npm run worker
scripts.api:test: npm run api:build && docker-compose run --rm --name gnome-api api npm test
scripts.app:clean: docker stop gnome-app && docker rm gnome-app
scripts.app:webserver: docker-compose run --rm -d --service-ports --name gnome-app client npm run webserver && echo 'webserver up on port 8090' && read -n1 -r -p 'Press any key to stop...' && echo 'going down for real...' && npm run app:clean
scripts.app:test: npm run app:build && docker-compose run --rm --name gnome-app-test client gulp test
scripts.app:e2e: npm run app:build && docker-compose up client
